RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 1 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 45000. INNER TURF (UP TO $7,830 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since November 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% Aftercare As sessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CENTAVO tracked the pace on the outside, was asked in the four path on the turn, gained to take the lead in the five path into the stretch then dropped in while moving clear and drew away under steady urging. NORGAY bumped with a rival at the start, showed speed on the outside, vied in the three path on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch then lost touch with the winner and proved no match while well clear for the place. PRINCE OF JOY prompted the pace on the inside, took a short lead near the nine-sixteenths, vied in the two path while inside of a rival on the turn, lost the advantage outside the five-sixteenths, dropped back into upper stretch then angled out while tiring and capitulated but earned the show. VOLIERO bumped with an opponent at the start, settled off the pace, was asked in the two path on the turn, dropped back near the five-sixteenths, spun three wide into the stretch and faltered. PRAYER BOOK came inward just after the start, settled off the pace, was roused while inside on the turn, dropped back near the five-sixteenths, turned into the stretch in the two path and also faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Prayer Book
ENTRY.COMMENT: came inward after brk,settled,asked rail turn,2p1/4,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted inside,even 5-1/2,led4-1/2-3/8,2p,headed5/16,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Voliero
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,settled,asked 2path turn,3p1/4,empty,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Norgay
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Player's Stable and Barrera III Oscar S
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,outside pace,3path turn,4p1/4,no match,clear2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Centavo
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside,asked 4path turn,chasd,5p1/4,took over 3/16,clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 37000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Other wise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEY THERE stumbled at the start crashing into RICELLE, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch and seized command from the embattled top pair with three-sixteenths to go, went clear under firm hand ride before being geared down in the late stages. JET SET JULIET broke out at the start bumping HANDLE THE TRUTH, vied briefly from the two path before easing off to chase along the inside, got let out spinning three wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on to secure the place honors. AERON WARRIOR coaxed from the gate, vied early on from the three path before emerging to duel three then two wide with OUR ROSIE DIAMONDS to the outside, tucked to the two path through the turn, spun just off the inside into upper stretch roused for the drive, yielded the front after having a narrow command at the three-sixteenths and kept on to preserve the show honors. OUR ROSIE DIAMONDS vied from the five path early on before dueling with AERON WARRIOR to her inside, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took brief sole command swinging four wide into upper stretch before being headed straightened away, then weakened in the final furlong. SAVE GRACE coaxed from the start, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch and tired. HANDLE THE TRUTH got bumped at the start by JET SET JULIET and conceded two lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun just off the inside for home and made no impact. RICELLE got bumped solidly at the start in behind AERON WARRIOR when HEY THERE stumbled to her outside and recovered inwards into her, chased six to seven paths off the rail down the backstretch before going five wide through the turn coaxed along from midway, cornered six wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Jet Set Juliet
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, vied early 2p, chased ins, 3w uppr, no match, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Handle the Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Aeron Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, vied early, dueled 3-2w, 2w 1/4, yielded 3/16, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Ricelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 6-7w, coaxed 5w 3/8, 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Hey There
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, 4-3w pursuit, 5w upper, up 3/16, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Our Rosie Diamonds
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early 5p, dueled 5-3w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Save Grace
ENTRY.OWNER: Caruso Michael J and Dubb Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 6w early, 4w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 90. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Seven Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DARK VECTOR stalked the leading duo on the outside, ranged up four wide to make a bid at the seven-sixteenths pole, took the lead at the three-eighths then shook clear at the five-sixteenths, was shaken up a bit while extending the advantage into upper stretch and widened while completely geared down to win handily. VENGE was coaxed along off the pace, dropped from the two path to the rail early on the turn, gained inside to make a bid at the seven-sixteenths pole, passed the three-eighths on even terms for the lead, lost touch with the winner late on the bend and proved no match while clear for the place. AMERICAN KNOW HOW leaned in at the start then was hustled, set a joint pace on the inside of a foe while taken in hand, vied in the two path on the turn, passed the three-eighths between foes then dropped back and tired while best of the rest. GOLDEN PURCHASE brushed with a rival after the start, settled under some urging, went five wide on the turn and failed to respond. SOMAMA BEACH brushed with a foe just after the start, set a joint pace on the outside, vied in the three path early on the turn, dropped back inside the seven-sixteenths and faltered then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: American Know How
ENTRY.OWNER: Reagan Jack Racing Hickey John M McKenna Michael and Pepe Anthony T
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned in brk,hustled,ins foe,in hand,btwn3/8,drop back5/16,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Venge
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed along,2p1/2,ins bid 7/16,drop back 5/16,no match,clr2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Purchase
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd after brk,settled some urging,5w turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Somama Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd after brk,outside pace,3p trn,drop back3/8,stoppd,easd,wlkd

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Vector
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable Gatsas Stables RAP Racing and Mara Chris
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked duo outside,4w bid 7/16,lead3/8,clear5/16,drew away,gear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 4 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Purse 95000. INNER TURF (UP TO $16,530 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONSTITUTIONLAWYER coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide, tipped out nudging his way four wide against LUNI SIMA at that station placed to urging, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch being floated out slightly by the leader, rallied to take command a furlong from home brushing with FILM STAR, dug in dueling to the finish and gamely held sway by a head to the wire. FILM STAR broke in at the start bumping COMPLETE AGENDA, raced three wide briefly before tipping out to chase from the five path, advanced on the leader and tucked four wide at the nine-sixteenths, applied pressure to the front taking command with five-sixteenths to run, swung five to six wide into upper stretch under threat and floated his main danger out slightly, dug in and brushed with that rival when headed for the front a furlong out, fought on gamely dueling to the finish but was ultimately denied to the end. COMPLETE AGENDA stumbled at the start and was bumped by FILM STAR, who broke inwards, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, cornered four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. LUNI SIMA four paths off the inside briefly, chased six then five wide down the backstretch before tucking four wide into the turn, came under coaxing near the five-sixteenths and was nudged five wide at that station by CONSTITUTIONLAWYER, went eight wide into upper stretch and tired. OGLETHORPE showed the way in hand four then three wide coming under pressure at the nine-sixteenths, came under coaxing half a mile from home, yielded the front with five-sixteenths to go and spun two to three wide into upper stretch, then tired in the drive. MILE FRACTION WAS HAND-TIMED DUE TO A TIMING ISSUE AND PROVIDED BY THE NYRA STEWARD

ENTRY.NAME: Constitutionlawyer
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC Brown Road Racing and Handal Raymond
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, nudged way 4w 5/16, 6-7w uppr, gamely

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Silver Springs Stud, LLC & Sandra Sexton

ENTRY.NAME: Oglethorpe
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC R A Hill Stable Gargan Danny and Sileno Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 4-3w, coaxed 1/2p, yielded 5/16, 2-3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Luni Sima
ENTRY.OWNER: Walder Peter R and EKB Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w early, chased 6-5w, 4w turn, nudged 5w 5/16, 8w uppr, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Complete Agenda
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled, bumped st, chased 3-4w, 4w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Film Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, 3w briefly, chased 5-4w, up 5/16, 5-6w upper, game

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 102. Claiming Purse 78000. (UP TO $13,572 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since November 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $40,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% After care Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUSINESS MODEL dropped back under urging early then settled at the rear, started the turn in the three path, shifted out to the six path continuing around the turn, rallied outside under a right-handed crop in upper stretch, closed strongly to make a bid outside the sixteenth-pole, fought determinedly outside of the runner-up to the finish and got up under strong handling. BACK RING LUCK was asked for some speed leaving the gate, pressed the pace on the outside, took a short lead in the three to four path on the turn, inched clear outside the quarter-pole, responded well when put to a right-handed crop into upper stretch, switched to a left-handed crop at the furlong marker, dug in under threat from the runner-up into the final sixteenth, drifted out some late and was denied. MILTON THE MONSTER was hustled from the gate, settled on the outside, was roused at the half-mile pole, chased four to five wide through the turn, pursued the top two under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. LAFITTE'S FLEET prompted the pace between foes, led narrowly passing the half-mile pole, vied in the two path on the turn, dropped back into upper stretch and tired. TWO THIRTY FIVE settled towards the back, moved from the rail to the two path while roused on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. THINKABOUTIT went to the front, showed the way under coaxing, vied inside while headed on the turn, dropped back into upper stretch and faded. BLACK BELT settled just off the pace, moved from the two path to the four path while asked on the turn, dropped back five wide into upper stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Two Thirty Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,ins-2path turn,3path into lane,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Black Belt
ENTRY.OWNER: EKB Stables LLC and P and L Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace,chased 2-4w turn,5w 3/16,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Business Model
ENTRY.OWNER: Qatar Racing LLC and Detampel Marc
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back early,settled,3-6w trn,rallied outside,bid ins1/8,up

ENTRY.NAME: Thinkaboutit
ENTRY.COMMENT: went to front,coaxed on lead,inside turn,faded

ENTRY.NAME: Lafitte's Fleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted between,led1/2,headed,2path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Back Ring Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: asked,press outside,3-4p trn,lead3/8,clr1/4,drift out late,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Milton the Monster
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,settled outside,asked1/2,chased 4-5wide turn,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 93. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since Novembe r 1 Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Seven Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BE THE BOSS five paths off the inside in pursuit from just off the pace dispute, tucked three wide into the turn and advanced on a pair of rivals dueling on the front end, took over command just inside the five-sixteenths and spun three wide into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive kept to task. WINNING CONNECTION coaxed from the start, chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three then two wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled eight wide into upper stretch, closed well outside to just get up for the place honors in the final jump. KING JAMES chased along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick and was just nailed on the wire for the place honors. NOLO CONTESTO hustled from the gate, vied among a trio early on in the three path before shaking away at the nine-sixteenths to duel with STARRYSTARRYKNIGHT to his outside when tucked to the rail, got joined by the eventual winner near the three-eighths and was overhauled just inside the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. MORE THAN WORK six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide at the nine-sixteenths, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and made no headway. HATCH seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out seven wide into upper stretch and offered no response. DON'T LET ME DOWN got bumped at the start by STARRYSTARRYKNIGHT, who broke outwards, chased four then three wide down the backstretch before going two to three wide through the turn coaxed along from the three-eighths, went seven wide at the head of the stretch and weakened. MACH ONE hustled from the gate, chased along the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, spun three wide for home and made no impact. BOBBY THE TANK vied from the two path early on until shaken off with nine-sixteenths to go, chased along the inside through the turn, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and folded. STARRYSTARRYKNIGHT broke out at the start bumping DON'T LET ME DOWN, vied from the four path with a pair early on before emerging to duel with NOLO CONTESTO to his inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, got shaken off inside the five-sixteenths and went four wide into upper stretch before giving way.

ENTRY.NAME: Mach One
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 2p 5/16, angled 4-5w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2p early, shaken off 9/16, ins turn, 2w 1/4p, folded

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, vied 3p early, dueled 9/16, ins turn, 2w 1/4p, wknd

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 4-5w backstretch, 3-2w turn, 8w upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Starrystarryknight
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, vied 4w early, dueled 2p 9/16, 4w upper, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Let Me Down
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 2-3w 3/8, 7w upper, weakened

ENTRY.OWNER: Nice Guys Stables Oringer Jay Al Bianchi Racing LLC and Hornstock Steve
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, advanced 3w turn, up ins 5/16, 3w uppr, edged clr

ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, to 3p 9/16, 6w upper, no headway

ENTRY.OWNER: Epona Racing Stable and Toga Party Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 7w backstretch, 4w turn, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FANCY JOKE was hustled to the front, set the pace under pressure to her outside, vied in the two to three path on the turn, shook clear at the five-sixteenths pole, came out some while set down into upper stretch, extended the lead under a drive into the final furlong and maintained a safe advantage under strong urging. CLOVER STREET moved out while settling off the pace, was roused while three then four wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and finished willingly for the place. MISS STONES pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the three to four path on the turn, dropped back near the five-sixteenths, moved inward into upper stretch, kept on in pursuit of the winner to the finish and lost the place while able to get the show. RED MOON was urged along off the pace, fell well back late on the backstretch, went two to three wide on the turn and improved position with late energy. REIGNING CHICK dropped back while climbing some early, raced inside to the two path on the turn and gained in the stretch but missed the superfecta. FANCY FELINE was moving her head around at the start and was off slow, spotted the front a few lengths, raced at the rear, went four wide on the turn and gained in the stretch but failed to threaten. TRY IT AGAIN chased the pace on the outside, went four to five wide on the turn and retreated. SONG PARODY was hustled from the start then chased the pace, angled in near the nine-sixteenths, saved ground on the turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Clover Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,mvd out,3-4wide turn,willingly for place

ENTRY.NAME: Fancy Joke
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,set pressured pace,2-3p turn,clear5/16,drew off,driving

ENTRY.OWNER: Valente Roddy J Bilinski Darlene and Alfred Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,vied 3-4path turn,mvd in 3/16,chased,lost 2nd

ENTRY.OWNER: Runnymede Farm Callahan Peter J and Boston Bettas Advisors
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,chased,angled in 4-1/2,inside turn,faltered

ENTRY.OWNER: Walder Peter R EKB Stables LLC and Surging Sky Ventures LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back,climbing some,ins-2path turn,gained stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Red Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,fell back 5/8,3-2path turn,improved,late energy

ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo Giangrande Salvatore and Giangrande Stefano
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside, 4-5path turn, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Fancy Feline
ENTRY.COMMENT: unprepared brk,off slow,outside,4w turn,gained stretch,no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. INNER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE O F $45,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter Since November 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessme nt Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME NATIVE coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch, rallied and leaned out on BREW PUB who attempted to keep him hemmed inside when FOOLISH GHOST drifted out in front in the vicinity of the eighth pole, took command a sixteenth from home, then dug in and inched away to the finish. BREW PUB chased five then four wide coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch, had the aforementioned foe lean outwards and attempted to hem him in behind the drifting leader nearing the eighth pole and absorbed a bump because of it, then offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. BIG ENGINE coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide lightly coaxed along from the get go, swung five then four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive to be on near even terms for command a sixteenth out, couldn't match the top pair late while keeping on to preserve the show honors. FOOLISH GHOST coaxed from the start, showed the way through swift splits four then three wide down the backstretch and into the turn, tucked to the two path midway and then widened away through to the quarter pole when swinging five wide for home, dug in under a drive drifting out near the eighth pole before being corrected, got overwhelmed by a trio with a sixteenth to go and weakened in the late stages. BAR FOURTEEN chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, offered no response. HORN OF PLENTY chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and weakened. There was a Trainer's Objection by the trainer of BREW PUB alleging interference against AWESOME NATIVE. After review, the objection was dismissed and the result stood prior to the race being declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Native
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, lean on foe, 5-6w uppr, up 1/16p

ENTRY.NAME: Bar Fourteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, angled 4w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Horn of Plenty
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed inside 3/8, 2-3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Big Engine
ENTRY.OWNER: Rice Linda and Bruce Golden Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, 5-4w upper, dug in, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Foolish Ghost
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 4-3w, 2p 3/8, shook away, 5w uppr, caught 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Brew Pub
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez, Rudy R. and Imperio, Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 5/16, 7w uppr, leaned on, mild kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Pr eferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANSEUR D'ORO tracked the pace on the outside, made a bid near the nine-sixteenths, vied in the three path on the turn, took the lead passing the three-eighths, shook clear under urging outside the quarter-pole, drew away under a drive into the final furlong then was completely geared down while much the best. KRYSTALHEIR settled off the pace, was urged four wide on the turn and willingly earned the place while no match for the winner. FOXY CARA was urged along off the pace, saved ground on the turn, checked just inside the three-eighths pole, spun three wide into the stretch, gained on the eased up winner in the stretch and missed the place while clear for the show. UNHOLY was reluctant to load, raced on the outside under urging, went five wide on the turn and failed to threaten. JESSICA'S RIDE was urged along off the pace, traveled around the turn in the two path and came up empty. SPLASHY chased the pace on the outside from third position, went four then three wide on the turn and tired. SHE'S A NINE went to the front, showed the way on the inside, was asked under threat on the turn, lost the lead at the three-eighths and stopped then was eased in the stretch but walked off. NORTH END LADY was urged along off the pace, dropped back two then three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and failed to respond.

ENTRY.COMMENT: showed way,inside turn,headed 3/8,stopped,eased,wlkd off

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside,bid7/16,3path turn,lead3/8,clear1/4,drew off

ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,inside turn,checked near 3/8,3w1/4,gained,earned show

ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along, 2-3path turn, 4w 1/4, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Jessica's Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along, 2path turn, came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Splashy
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club Rocco Steven Lee Jong and Cutair Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside, 4-3path turn, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,urged 4wide turn,no match,willingly for place

ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Lion Thoroughbreds and Skelly Matthew S
